Description.Text:
The Expocentre of Ukraine National Complex is located close to the hotel. The hotel offers accommodation in 58 rooms of different categories Standard, Junior Suite, and Apartment. Every room features a hair-dryer, a minibar, air-conditioning, satellite TV, Internet access. The Getmansky and the Litoral restaurants offer dishes of Ukrainian cuisine. The Wild Forest bar offers a choice of cocktails and live music. The Kozatsky Stan Hotel has two conference halls, the European and the Capital, and a meeting room. The conference halls accommodate up to 200 people and are equipped with up-to-date facilities. The following hotel services are also at guests disposal a parking lot, laundry and dry-cleaning services, a business centre, taxi call, a sauna.
